channel.title: nlin.SI updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: nlin.SI updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: QRT Map on a Bielliptic Surface
item.description: arXiv:2410.14327v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: The family of mappings of the plane possessing a biquadratic invaiant, which is known collectively as QRT maps, is composed of two involutions, one preserving a vertical shift and the other preserving a horizontal shift in the plane. In this paper, we extend the map by replacing each shift by the group operation on each of two families of elliptic curves, whose product forms a bielliptic surface.
item.dc:creator: Nalini Joshi, Frank W. Nijhoff, Allan Steel

item.title: A simple approach to identify systems of nonlinear recursions featuring solutions whose evolution is explicitly ascertainable and which may be asymptotically isochronous as functions of the independent variable (a ticking time)
item.description: arXiv:2410.14448v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: In this paper a procedure is described which allows to identify new systems of nonlinear recursions whose solutions are controllable and which may be asymptotically isochronous as functions of the independent variable (considered a ticking time).
item.dc:creator: Francesco Calogero
